edu.sumit.optx.util

Class LogField

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.sumit.optx.util.LogField
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LogGroup

    public class LogField
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a single QuickFIX field. This object provides extra information about the field in the context of its message. The QuickFIX DataDictionary is used to provide information about whether or not the field is a header or trailer field, if it is a required field, etc.
